title: WPL 2024: Delhi Capitals Edge Out Royal Challengers Bangalore in a Nail-Biting Finish!
content:
The **Women's Premier League 2024** saw a thrilling encounter between the **Delhi Capitals** and **Royal Challengers Bangalore** at the Arun Jaitley Stadium in New Delhi. 

**Delhi Capitals** set a competitive target of 182 runs, thanks to a brilliant half-century from **Jemimah Rodrigues** and a crucial knock from **Alice Capsey**. 

**Royal Challengers Bangalore** almost pulled off a stunning victory with a sensational innings from **Richa Ghosh**. She almost took her team home with a late charge of 51 runs off 29 balls. 

However, in a nerve-wracking final over, **Jess Jonassen** held her nerve and the **Delhi Capitals** clinched a nail-biting one-run victory, securing their fifth win and topping the WPL table.
author: Scroll Staff
